description: Visualizations of the performance of the KeyFob system verses KPIs

panels.description: Assigned Keyfobs denied access to Tennis Court or Pool during open periods.

targets.rawSql:
with forbids as
(
	select distinct fob_id, door,  EXTRACT(week from vk.swipe_time) as week_value, EXTRACT(year from vk.swipe_time) as year_value
	from door_controller.v_keyswipes vk
	where vk.status = 'Forbid'
	and EXTRACT(hour from vk.swipe_time)>6 and EXTRACT(hour from vk.swipe_time) <22
)
select count(*), TO_DATE(year_value::text || week_value::text, 'IYYYIW')
--from door_controller.v_keyswipes vk
from forbids f
inner join key_fobs.keyfobs k on
k.fob_id = f.fob_id
inner join door_controller.door d
on d.door_no = f.door
where d.door_desc not like '%Club%'
and f.fob_id in (select fob_id from key_fobs.v_2025_homeowner_fob_list)
group by week_value, year_value
order by year_value desc, week_value desc;

panels.title: Valid Forbids - Historical

panels.description: Number of Assigned KeyFobs that were forbid access to Tennis Courts or Pool in the current week.

targets.rawSql:
WITH forbids AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        fob_id,
        door,
        EXTRACT(week FROM vk.swipe_time) AS week_value,
        EXTRACT(year FROM vk.swipe_time) AS year_value
    FROM
        door_controller.v_keyswipes vk
    WHERE
        vk.status = 'Forbid'
        AND EXTRACT(hour FROM vk.swipe_time) > 6
        AND EXTRACT(hour FROM vk.swipe_time) < 22
),
current_forbids_summary AS (
    SELECT
        COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) AS forbid_count,
        TO_DATE(year_value::text || LPAD(week_value::text, 2, '0'), 'IYYYIW') AS the_date
    FROM
        forbids f
    INNER JOIN
        key_fobs.keyfobs k ON k.fob_id = f.fob_id
    INNER JOIN
        door_controller.door d ON d.door_no = f.door
    WHERE
        d.door_desc NOT LIKE '%Club%'
        AND f.fob_id IN (SELECT fob_id FROM key_fobs.v_2025_homeowner_fob_list)
    GROUP BY
        week_value,
        year_value
),
this_week_calc AS (
    -- Calculate the current week's Monday date based on ISO week
    SELECT
        TO_DATE(EXTRACT(year FROM CURRENT_DATE)::text || LPAD(EXTRACT(week FROM CURRENT_DATE)::text, 2, '0'), 'IYYYIW') AS current_week_monday
)
SELECT
    COALESCE(cfs.forbid_count, 0) AS final_forbid_count
FROM
    this_week_calc twc
LEFT JOIN
    current_forbids_summary cfs ON twc.current_week_monday = cfs.the_date;

panels.title: Current Week Forbids

targets.rawSql:
with forbids as
(
	select distinct fob_id, door,  EXTRACT(week from vk.swipe_time) as week_value, EXTRACT(year from vk.swipe_time) as year_value
	from door_controller.v_keyswipes vk
	where vk.status = 'Allow'
	and EXTRACT(hour from vk.swipe_time)>6 and EXTRACT(hour from vk.swipe_time) <22
)
select count(*), TO_DATE(year_value::text || week_value::text, 'IYYYIW')
--from door_controller.v_keyswipes vk
from forbids f
inner join key_fobs.keyfobs k on
k.fob_id = f.fob_id
inner join door_controller.door d
on d.door_no = f.door
where d.door_desc not like '%Club%'
and f.fob_id not in (select fob_id from key_fobs.v_2025_homeowner_fob_list)
group by week_value, year_value
order by year_value desc, week_value desc;

panels.description: Count of Unassigned KeyfobID being used to access Pool or Tennis courts during operating hours during the current week.

targets.rawSql:
WITH forbids AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        fob_id,
        door,
        EXTRACT(week FROM vk.swipe_time) AS week_value,
        EXTRACT(year FROM vk.swipe_time) AS year_value
    FROM
        door_controller.v_keyswipes vk
    WHERE
        vk.status = 'Allow'
        AND EXTRACT(hour FROM vk.swipe_time) > 6
        AND EXTRACT(hour FROM vk.swipe_time) < 22
),
current_forbids_summary AS (
    SELECT
        COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) AS forbid_count,
        TO_DATE(year_value::text || LPAD(week_value::text, 2, '0'), 'IYYYIW') AS the_date
    FROM
        forbids f
    INNER JOIN
        key_fobs.keyfobs k ON k.fob_id = f.fob_id
    INNER JOIN
        door_controller.door d ON d.door_no = f.door
    WHERE
        d.door_desc NOT LIKE '%Club%'
        AND f.fob_id NOT IN (SELECT fob_id FROM key_fobs.v_2025_homeowner_fob_list)
    GROUP BY
        week_value,
        year_value
),
this_week_calc AS (
    -- Calculate the current week's Monday date based on ISO week
    SELECT
        TO_DATE(EXTRACT(year FROM CURRENT_DATE)::text || LPAD(EXTRACT(week FROM CURRENT_DATE)::text, 2, '0'), 'IYYYIW') AS current_week_monday
)
SELECT
    COALESCE(cfs.forbid_count, 0) AS final_forbid_count
FROM
    this_week_calc twc
LEFT JOIN
    current_forbids_summary cfs ON twc.current_week_monday = cfs.the_date;
